alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Franklin, Sebastian, eastern Pushmataha, northeastern Choctaw and Le Flore Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Cameron to near Messer. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Charleston... Greenwood... Pocola... Heavener... Panama... Mansfield... Talihina... Wister... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Branch... Midland... Rattan... Cameron... Albion... Octavia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for west central Arkansas...and southeastern Oklahoma.
